sentence.p: John.2.1Καὶ τῇ ἡμέρᾳ τῇ τρίτῃ γάμος ἐγένετο ἐν Κανὰ τῆς Γαλιλαίας, καὶ ἦν ἡ μήτηρ τοῦ Ἰησοῦ ἐκεῖ·

word.def: a day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
third.
a marriage, wedding, wedding-ceremony; plur: a wedding-feast.
Galilee, a district towards the southern end of the Roman province Syria; the northern division of Palestine.
a mother.
Jesus; the Greek form of Joshua; Jesus, son of Eliezer; Jesus, surnamed Justus.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there.

verbs.verb: ἐγένετο ( γίνομαι ) third singular aorist middle indicative
ἦν ( εἰμί ) third singular imperfect active indicative

sentence.p: John.2.2ἐκλήθη δὲ καὶ ὁ Ἰησοῦς καὶ οἱ μαθηταὶ αὐτοῦ εἰς τὸν γάμον.

word.def: (a) I call, summon, invite, (b) I call, name.
a learner, disciple, pupil.

verbs.verb: ἐκλήθη ( καλέω ) third singular aorist passive indicative

sentence.p: John.2.3καὶ ὑστερήσαντος οἴνου λέγει ἡ μήτηρ τοῦ Ἰησοῦ πρὸς αὐτόν Οἶνον οὐκ ἔχουσιν.

word.def: I fall behind, am lacking, fall short, suffer need, am inferior to.
wine.
(denoting speech in progress), (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
I have, hold, possess.

verbs.verb: ὑστερήσαντος ( ὑστερέω ) genitive singular aorist active participle
λέγει ( λέγω ) third singular present active indicative
ἔχουσιν. ( ἔχω ) third plural present active indicative

sentence.p: John.2.4καὶ λέγει αὐτῇ ὁ Ἰησοῦς Τί ἐμοὶ καὶ σοί, γύναι; οὔπω ἥκει ἡ ὥρα μου.

word.def: who, which, what, why.
I, the first-person pronoun.
you.
a woman, wife, my lady.
not yet.
I have come, am present, have arrived.
(a) a definite space of time, a season, (b) an hour, (c) the particular time for anything.

verbs.verb: λέγει ( λέγω ) third singular present active indicative
ἥκει ( ἥκω ) third singular present active indicative

sentence.p: John.2.5λέγει ἡ μήτηρ αὐτοῦ τοῖς διακόνοις Ὅ τι ἂν λέγῃ ὑμῖν, ποιήσατε.

word.def: a waiter, servant; then of any one who performs any service, an administrator.

an untranslatable word (under the circumstances, in that case, anyhow), the general effect of which is to make a statement contingent, which would otherwise be definite: it is thus regularly used with the subjunctive mood.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.

verbs.verb: λέγει ( λέγω ) third singular present active indicative
λέγῃ ( λέγω ) third singular present active subjunctive
ποιήσατε. ( ποιέω ) second plural aorist active imperative

sentence.p: John.2.6ἦσαν δὲ ἐκεῖ λίθιναι ὑδρίαι ἓξ κατὰ τὸν καθαρισμὸν τῶν Ἰουδαίων κείμεναι, χωροῦσαι ἀνὰ μετρητὰς δύο ἢ τρεῖς.

word.def: I lie, recline, am placed, am laid, set, specially appointed, destined.
made of stone.
a water pot, jar, pitcher.
six.
gen: against, down from, throughout, by; acc: over against, among, daily, day-by-day, each day, according to, by way of.
cleansing, purifying, purification, literal, ceremonial, or moral; met: expiation.
Jewish.
(lit: I make room, hence) (a) I have room for, receive, contain, (b) I make room for by departing, go, make progress, turn myself.
prep. Rare in NT; prop: upwards, up; among, between; in turn; apiece, by; as a prefix: up, to, anew, back.
a measure, amphora, about 39.39 liters or 8.75 gallons.
two.
or, than.
three.

verbs.verb: ἦσαν ( εἰμί ) third plural imperfect active indicative
κείμεναι, ( κεῖμαι ) nominative plural present middlepassive participle
χωροῦσαι ( χωρέω ) nominative plural present active participle

sentence.p: John.2.7λέγει αὐτοῖς ὁ Ἰησοῦς Γεμίσατε τὰς ὑδρίας ὕδατος.

word.def: I fill, load.
water.

verbs.verb: λέγει ( λέγω ) third singular present active indicative
Γεμίσατε ( γεμίζω ) second plural aorist active imperative

word.def: (a) conj: until, (b) prep: as far as, up to, as much as, until.
up, above, up to the top, up to the brim, things above, heaven, the heavenly region.

verbs.verb: ἐγέμισαν ( γεμίζω ) third plural aorist active indicative

sentence.p: John.2.8καὶ λέγει αὐτοῖς Ἀντλήσατε νῦν καὶ φέρετε τῷ ἀρχιτρικλίνῳ.

word.def: I draw (generally water from a deep well in the ground); perhaps: I draw out.
adv. (a) of time: just now, even now; just at hand, immediately, (b) of logical connection: now then, (c) in commands and appeals: at this instant.
I carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known.
master of ceremonies at a dinner, master of the feast.

verbs.verb: λέγει ( λέγω ) third singular present active indicative
Ἀντλήσατε ( ἀντλέω ) second plural aorist active imperative
φέρετε ( φέρω ) second plural present active imperative
ἤνεγκαν. ( φέρω ) third plural aorist active indicative

sentence.p: John.2.9ὡς δὲ ἐγεύσατο ὁ ἀρχιτρίκλινος τὸ ὕδωρ οἶνον γεγενημένον, καὶ οὐκ ᾔδει πόθεν ἐστίν, οἱ δὲ διάκονοι ᾔδεισαν οἱ ἠντληκότες τὸ ὕδωρ, φωνεῖ τὸν νυμφίον ὁ ἀρχιτρίκλινος καὶ λέγει αὐτῷ Πᾶς ἄνθρωπος πρῶτον τὸν καλὸν οἶνον τίθησιν, καὶ ὅταν μεθυσθῶσιν τὸν ἐλάσσω· σὺ τετήρηκας τὸν καλὸν οἶνον ἕως ἄρτι.

word.def: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.
(a) I taste, (b) I experience.
I know, remember, appreciate.
whence, from what place.
I give forth a sound, hence: (a) of a cock: I crow, (b) of men: I shout, (c) trans: I call (to myself), summon; I invite, address.
a bridegroom.
first, before, principal, most important.
beautiful, as an outward sign of the inward good, noble, honorable character; good, worthy, honorable, noble, and seen to be so.
I put, place, lay, set, fix, establish.
when, whenever.
I am intoxicated with wine, am drunk.
less, smaller; poorer, inferior.
I keep, guard, observe, watch over.
now, just now, at this moment.

verbs.verb: ἐγεύσατο ( γεύομαι ) third singular aorist middle indicative
γεγενημένον, ( γίνομαι ) accusative singular perfect passive participle
ᾔδει ( οἶδα ) third singular pluperfect active indicative
ἐστίν, ( εἰμί ) third singular present active indicative
ᾔδεισαν ( οἶδα ) third plural pluperfect active indicative
ἠντληκότες ( ἀντλέω ) nominative plural perfect active participle
φωνεῖ ( φωνέω ) third singular present active indicative
λέγει ( λέγω ) third singular present active indicative
τίθησιν, ( τίθημι ) third singular present active indicative
μεθυσθῶσιν ( μεθύω ) third plural aorist passive subjunctive
τετήρηκας ( τηρέω ) second singular perfect active indicative

sentence.p: John.2.11Ταύτην ἐποίησεν ἀρχὴν τῶν σημείων ὁ Ἰησοῦς ἐν Κανὰ τῆς Γαλιλαίας καὶ ἐφανέρωσεν τὴν δόξαν αὐτοῦ, καὶ ἐπίστευσαν εἰς αὐτὸν οἱ μαθηταὶ αὐτοῦ.

word.def: a sign, miracle, indication, mark, token.
I make clear (visible, manifest), make known.
honor, renown; glory, an especially divine quality, the unspoken manifestation of God, splendor.

verbs.verb: ἐποίησεν ( ποιέω ) third singular aorist active indicative
ἐφανέρωσεν ( φανερόω ) third singular aorist active indicative
ἐπίστευσαν ( πιστεύω ) third plural aorist active indicative
